sentence.Network_en: A certain degree of stem solidness results in damaged and desiccated eggs and impaired larval movements.
sentence.Network_cn: 一定的茎秆硬度会致使虫卵损伤和脱水,削移幼虫的移动.

sentence.Network_en: Self - esteem is a solidness at the core of your being.
sentence.Network_cn: 自尊 有如磐石,镇住你存在的核心.

sentence.Network_en: The solidness of her faith gave her enduring hope.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对忠诚的坚贞不二给了她长久的希望.

means.word_mean: 1. the state in which a substance has no tendency to flow under moderate stress; resists forces (such as compression) that tend to deform it; and retains a definite size and shape
